channel.title: nylan.cat
channel.description: A pleasing site, for pleasing people

item.title: Thoughts on AI
item.description: I am confused by the AI boom. Not so much by it existing, more by the fact that I am unsure how to feel about it.

item.title: Welcome to Electric Dreams
item.description: I've redesigned the site with a new Electric Dreams theme. Dark backgrounds, neon colors, and a whole lot of vibes.

item.title: Nostalgia
item.description: There's something to be said for nostalgia. I remember late nights, sat at my computer. The warm glow of the monitor, the gentle hum of the fans.
